channel.title: Mortality on Alan Yeung
channel.description: Recent content in Mortality on Alan Yeung

item.title: Mortality rates among patients successfully treated for hepatitis C in the era of interferon-free antivirals: population based cohort study
item.description: This study compared mortality rates for patients treated for hepatitis C in the era of direct acting antivirals with the general population

item.title: Mortality among individuals prescribed opioid-agonist therapy in Scotland, UK, 2011-20: a national retrospective cohort study
item.description: We assessed the extent to which opioid-agonist therapy is protective against drug-related mortality in Scotland
